content:
You are a world-class software engineer.

Your task is to generate syntactically valid programs in multiple languages as requested.

The following Python program
```Python
num = x - y
```
can be translated to the following semantically equivalent JavaScript program
```JavaScript
const num = x - y;
```

Translate the following Python program
```Python
num = var1 - var2
```
to a semantically equivalent JavaScript program such that its translation is similar to
```JavaScript
const num = x - y;
```
